name: Dungeon Delver (itch) (Aps1s)
description:
Dungeon Delver is a 2D pixel art, turn based, roguelike dungeon crawler made by myself and a team of classmates in our Casual Game Production class. We were required to make a game that uses a single input method and could theoretically be played on a mobile devise, and were given limited themes and genres to create something from.

Eventually we settled on Dungeon Delver, and after a a lot of work I think the whole team is happy with the final results and proud to be able to share the game we created.

Team
  • Jean-Paul Gaboriau - Programmer
  • Jiajia Dong - Programmer
  • Nakita 'Nikko' Camacho - Character Artist
  • Casey Chung - Character Artist
  • Jonathon McCormack - Environment/Menu Artist
  • Aaron Martin - UI Artist
  • Jonathon Bridges - VFX Artist
